elements.title: The Queen's Gambit
elements.actors: Anya Taylor-Joy, Bill Camp, Marielle Heller
elements.description: In a 1950s orphanage, a young girl reveals an astonishing talent for chess and begins an unlikely journey to stardom while grappling with addiction.

elements.title: Griselda
elements.actors: Sofía Vergara, Alberto Guerra, Christian Tappan
elements.description: Inspired by real events, this fictional dramatization shows Griselda Blanco's journey from Medellín to becoming the Godmother of Miami's drug empire.

elements.title: Wednesday
elements.actors: Jenna Ortega, Gwendoline Christie, Riki Lindhome
elements.description: Smart, sarcastic and a little dead inside, Wednesday Addams investigates a murder spree while making new friends — and foes — at Nevermore Academy.

elements.title: Bridgerton
elements.actors: Adjoa Andoh, Julie Andrews, Lorraine Ashbourne
elements.description: The eight close-knit siblings of the Bridgerton family look for love and happiness in London high society. Inspired by Julia Quinn's bestselling novels.

elements.title: Narcos
elements.actors: Wagner Moura, Pedro Pascal, Boyd Holbrook
elements.description: The true story of Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels fuels this gritty gangster drama series.
